main.docTitle:
Lotteries Fund
Resolutions of the Legislative Council

subsection.leadIn: Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council on 30 June 1965.

subparagraph.content: that with effect from 30 June 1965, there shall be established a fund styled the LOTTERIES FUND;

subparagraph.leadIn: that there shall be credited to the Fund—

subparagraph.name: a
subparagraph.content: a sum of $7,418,920 to be appropriated from the general revenue with effect from the date of creation of the Fund;

subparagraph.name: b
subparagraph.content: such appropriations from the general revenue as may from time to time be made by this Council;

subparagraph.name: c
subparagraph.content: such sums as may be required by or under any Ordinance to be credited thereto;

subparagraph.name: d
subparagraph.content: all sums received by way of repayment of loans or advances granted from the Fund;

subparagraph.name: e
subparagraph.content: all sums received by way of interest or dividend on investments, deposits, loans or advances of the Fund;

subparagraph.name: f
subparagraph.content: such donations as may be offered to the Fund and which have been approved by the Finance Committee of this Council.

subsection.content: Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council on 10 March 1966.Resolved that in pursuance of a resolution passed by Legislative Council on 30 June 1965, the sum of $2,026,540 shall be appropriated from general revenue and transferred to the credit of the Fund.

Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council on 15 March 1967.Resolved that pursuant to a resolution passed by the Legislative Council on 30 June 1965, the sum of $2,398,893 shall be appropriated from general revenue and transferred to the credit of the Lotteries Fund.
